description: Root object for the JSON data structure

metadata.description: Part of the 3D asset file https://github.com/asam-ev/OpenMATERIAL/blob/main/content/geometry/general.adoc#3d-asset-file ; contains key information about the asset, including its identity, authorship, technical specifications, and legal details.

name.description: The display name of the asset, such as 'Car Model A' or 'Urban Scene 1'.

description.description: A concise summary of the asset's purpose or features (2-3 sentences).

uuid.description: Universally unique identifier for the asset. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universally_unique_identifier. The uuid stays the same, even if version is updated.

assetVersion.description: The version number of the asset, following Semantic Versioning (e.g., '1.0.0').

openMaterialVersion.description: The version of the OpenMATERIAL specification used, adhering to Semantic Versioning.

copyright.description: Indicates copyright details, including the year and copyright holder (e.g., 'Â© 2024 ACME Inc.').

license.description: Describes the license for asset distribution. Use an SPDX identifier for open-source licenses (e.g., 'MIT'), or provide a URL or filename for proprietary licenses.

author.description: Lists the author(s) of the asset as a name, email, or company. Multiple authors should be comma-separated.

modelCreationTool.description: Specifies the software or tool (and version) used to create the 3D model (e.g., 'Blender 3.5').

creationDate.description: The date and time of asset creation, formatted in ISO 8601 (e.g., '2024-11-20T15:30:00Z').

modelingMethod.description: Indicates how the model was created, e.g., '3D scan', 'photo-based modeling', or 'freehand design'.

validationDescription.description: Details the validation process used to compare the model geometry with real-world objects.

assetType.description: Specifies whether the asset represents an individual object ('object') or a collection of objects ('scene').

objectClass.description: Classifies the object type when 'assetType' is 'object', e.g., 'vehicle' or 'human'.

animated.description: Indicates whether the 3D model contains keyframe animations.

pbrMaterialWorkflow.description: Whether the Physically Based Rendering (PBR) material workflow used. If so, workflow should be either 'metallic' or 'specular'.

triangleCount.description: The total number of triangles in the model. A quad polygon counts as two triangles.

meshCount.description: The total number of meshes in the 3D geometry.

textureResolutions.description: Lists all texture resolutions used in the 3D model (e.g., '1K', '2K', '4K').

normalMapFormat.description: Specifies whether the 3D model utilizes normal maps as textures. If so, its format should be either DirectX or OpenGL.

boundingBox.description: Defines the axis-aligned which defines the spatial boundaries of an asset in a 3D space.

x.description: Minimum and maximum values in meters along the x-axis.

y.description: Minimum and maximum values in meters along the y-axis.

z.description: Minimum and maximum values in meters along the z-axis.

materialMappingUri.description: Relative path to a material mapping file (.xomm). In this file, material names from the 3D model file or texture color codes from textures assigned in materialTextureAssignment are linked to OpenMATERIAL property files.

materialTextureAssignment.description: Optional array containing material texture assignments. It links material names contained in the 3D model file to OpenMATERIAL assignment textures. In a separate material mapping file, the 'color' values in this texture are linked to OpenMATERIAL property files.

items.description: Name of the material in the 3D model file.
File path to the OpenMATERIAL assignment texture. Supported texture formats are png and jpg.
